attributes.action: Remove the VAT for treating Pets at Vets.
attributes.additional_details: There are many  many dogs looking for homes but its an expense that many just cant afford as they have to consider Vets Bills. Lets get rid of the extra 20% on Bills.
attributes.background: Its expensive enough and we shouldn't have to pay for treating a sick animal any than we already do. Going to the Vets is an expensive visit and added to that we have to pay 20% on top of all treatment and drugs.
